summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2114, for the improvement of Nob Hill Avenue in the City of Seattle, from Aloha Street to Highland Drive, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 21208 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
